channel.title: Comments on: Trying Out The Twenty Sixteen Theme

item.title: By: Sudhir Khanger
item.dc:creator: Sudhir Khanger
item.description: I find Twenty Sixteen theme pretty weird. Everything is scattered here and there. There's white space in random places. Images pop-up to the left. Alignment is all over the place. I don't really know where to focus. It's one of the least appealing theme to me.
item.content:encoded: I find Twenty Sixteen theme pretty weird. Everything is scattered here and there. There’s white space in random places. Images pop-up to the left. Alignment is all over the place. I don’t really know where to focus. It’s one of the least appealing theme to me.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2016/02/10/trying-out-the-twenty-sixteen-theme/#comment-4446">DexterTheDragon</a>.
Welcome to my personal modal window of the web ;-)
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: DexterTheDragon
item.dc:creator: DexterTheDragon
item.description: I feel like I'm trapped in some sort of weird modal window.
item.content:encoded: I feel like I’m trapped in some sort of weird modal window.
